name: Holdiay 2013 Shipping Info
description:
I will be shipping all orders placed between December 12-December 16 on the 16th. 

After that, I'll ship as orders come in to get your package to you asap. 

I'm also offering a free upgrade to priority mail (Domestic orders only) until December 24!

name: Rainbows of Glass earrings
description:
Handmade furnace glass beads from California pair naturally with sterling silver for fun, casual earrings. 

Moss Green currently in stock.

More to come. Please contact me if there's a color you'd like to see!

name: Hoop De Do earrings
description:
Sterling silver hoops dangle the most cunningly composted components. 

Super-vivid iridescent Swarovski crystals nestle inside vintage enameled beadcaps, flanking a discontinued Swarovski 'modular' bead in Jet.

Open hoop measures 7/8" in diameter, total length is 1 7/8".

name: Pure Glamour earrings
description:
Pearl, vivid coral, and dreamy blue apatite combine with Swarovski crystals for a knockout pair of danglers.

Earrings measure 3 5/8" long.
Sterling silver.

name: Captive Heart earrings
description:
For a romantic soul, who's lost her heart. 

Handwrought hearts entwined with silver, 18kt gold, and diamonds dangle from simple silver wires.

Earrings measure 1 3/4" long.

name: Frosty Glamour earrings
description:
Porcelain daggers in frosty shades dangle from exquisite Swarovski crystals, stacked in pairs. The overall effect is cool and casually elegant.

Earrings measure 2" long.
Sterling silver.

name: Champagne Earrings
description:
Effervescent Champagne quartz beads sit atop a stack of bronzy antique sequins from France. Below dangle unique and discontinued Swarovski 'modular' beads in jet black. 

These earrings will set the tone for any celebration.

Earrings measure 1 3/4" long.
Sterling silver.

name: Deeply Sophisticated earrings
description:
Long, handformed silver wires dangle handmade glass beads in a deep red shade. Below shines an organic form in pure silver.

Earrings are 2 5/8" long.

name: Hot Drops earrings
description:
These earrings feature a hand-forged bronze ring, from which dangles a component made up of antique french metal sequins, a fiery Swarovski crystal, and a vintage flower bead in glowing shades of red and orange.

Earrings measure 1 3/4" long.
Sterling silver.

name: Smoky Quartz and Garnet earrings
description:
These earrings feature lovely stones in unusual shapes. The beveled garnet squares are drilled on the diagonal to catch the light. Dangling below are beautifully faceted drums of smoky quartz, nestling on squares of hammered sterling silver.

The subtle color of the smoky quartz gains richness from berry red garnet.

Earrings measure 1.5" in length.

name: Well Red Bracelet
description:
This bracelet started with the TruAde bottle cap bead.  I just wanted to EAT that beautiful red color! Oddly, it says 'orange' on the cap.  Whatever.

I dug deep into the stash, seeking out form and color.  I found vintage Japanese glass and chose two of the lovely striped beads. The curvy noodle of vintage plastic is a luscious, lipsticky shade. My own lampwork ladybug was a natural, and adds a fun sculptural element.  I took one of my fused fine-silver wire hearts and wrapped it up with matte red Delica beads from Japan.  The silver wire shows through the glass, so they shine from within.  Swarovski-set rondelles and 22K gold vermeil spacers accent this divine composition of color and texture.

Sterling silver toggle clasp, overall length is 9 inches.  Contact me for a custom fit.

name: Island Sunset Earrings
description:
I made these earrings with the Island Sunset bracelet in mind: vintage 'angel-skin' coral, pink Swarovski crystals, 22K gold vermeil spacers, with bold Swarovski-set rondelles and vintage glass flowers in shades of orange that perfectly echo the carnelian in the bracelet.

Handmade sterling silver wires. Earrings dangle 1-1/4 inches from the top.

name: Island Sunset collage bracelet
description:
Shades of pink and orange glow in a bracelet inspired by the sunsets of Kauai.

A silver bead inlaid with created opal reminded me of the beautiful Kauai skies, and was the starting point for this bracelet.  It's stacked with a Swarovski-set rondelle and small vintage bead of rare 'angel-skin' coral. I recalled the sea by using Cathy Lanzl's art bead cast from the texture of a sea urchin's shell. That texture is echoed in turn with a filigree tube bead studded at either end with a peachy crystal.  
I created an original component by threading vintage French metal sequins with iridescent matte Delica seed beads onto sterling wire, then coiling that around a large pink crystal to achieve texture, interest and subtle sparkle. An orange soda pop cap bead pairs with vintage pink glass to boldly state: Sun, Pink. It's tempered by a soft pink crystal cube, given motion by a tassel of tiny, intensely orange carnelian. Sprinkled with 22K gold vermeil spacers, like a bit of sunshine.

Italian heart-shaped clasp is easier to use than typical lobster claws.  All sterling silver wire and findings. Adjustable from 8-9 inches long.

name: Coeur Cache with diamonds and 18K gold
description:
A beautiful 'captive heart' of fine (.999) and sterling silver, enriched with rough diamonds strung on 18K gold wire.

The heart is made from 12g fine silver wire, fused rather than soldered. It's bound with fine and sterling silver.  Fine silver does not contain any copper, and therefore won't tarnish.  It also takes patina beautifully, acquiring a gentle iridescence. The coloring sets off the diamonds and gold beautifully.

The heart measures 1 3/8" high and wide; hangs asymmetrically.

Matching earrings available.

name: Gorgeous Black Bracelet
description:
After making a batch of Halloween jewelry, I just had to pull out these fantastic branchy pieces of glass.  Nothing but black would do with them, so I fabricated a setting for the vintage molded glass cabochon, and created a link with the modular Swarovski crystals, in jet black, that I am currently in love with.  The dichroic sparkle of the handmade glass branches is echoed in a few choice Swarovski crystal accents, but nothing to overpower the sensational effect of glamorous, gorgeous black.


Finished with a silver toggle clasp and a silver tag, signed K/2012.

Bracelet measures 7 inches long. Contact me if you'd like a custom fit.

name: ROWR! Kitty Paw Ring
description:
Perfect for fending off a bad mood.  The paw also fits nicely onto the tip of a nose.

Wool felt cat paw, with bright pinky-orange pads, reaching out of a sterling silver box.  Wool is wonderfully lightweight, so although it looks top-heavy, all the weight of the ring is at the base. The paw is set into epoxy within the box.  It's not going anywhere.  

Signed and dated.  Ring size 7.5, can be sized up.  Height, including box, is 2-1/4 inches.

name: Garden Soil Bracelet
description:
Anne Choi's lovely bead featured here depicts gardening tools; it suggested to me a colorway based on the things you might see while using those tools, the rich browns and earthy tones turned up while working the soil.

To do that, I used frosted peridot pebbles; some tumbled sapphire rough; a keshi pearl whose shape and color are uncannily leaf-like; a large lampwork bead in pinkish-brownish-taupish tones, not unlike a snail shell; and a little raku heart, made special with the addition of a tiny silver bee.  I wanted some sparkle and movement, so I added three tiny Swarovski butterflies, in subtle finishes.

Twig-textured sterling silver toggle clasp. Meaures 8-1/4 inches long.

name: Dog Park Bracelet
description:
Too Fun!  A passel of playful pups cavorting around your wrist.  

Each dog is drawn as a single line of sterling silver wire.  The clasp is a toggle depicting a big bone and a Frisbee.
 
Ultra lightweight; you'd forget you had it on, if you could stop smiling at it!

Bracelet measures 7 inches long.

name: Bunny Earrings
description:
These earrings are off-the-charts cute, but their simplicity gives them a modern edge and keeps them from being syrupy.

Sterling silver wire, all handformed by me.  Hanging length one inch.

name: Hibiscus Pendant
description:
The silhouette outline of a hibiscus flower, drawn in 16-gauge sterling silver wire.

After soldering, I gently hammered the piece to flatten the wire and create a beautiful calligraphic line.  

A large jump ring serves as a bail without interrupting the drawing.  This would look great on a cord, chain, or silk ribbon.

name: Hibiscus Shoulder-Dusters
description:
Long, lovely, and light as a feather, these earrings will be a dream to wear.

Two not-quite-matching hibiscus flowers, drawn with sterling silver wire, hang from lengths of fine sterling chain and earwires.  

Overall hanging length is 3-5/8 inches (9.5cm).  The larger flower is 1-5/8 inches (41mm) across. 

Please notice that although the flowers aren't identical, I used slightly differing lengths of chain so that the overall length matches.

name: Hibiscus Lei
description:
Three hibiscus flowers rest at the front of this lovely, featherweight necklace.  It's perfect for spring and summer, or just for thinking about them.  

Hand-formed flowers of sterling silver wire, arranged 2 and 1 on a fine sterling silver chain.  Three rings at the end allow for small adjustments.

The largest flower measures 2-5/8" (41mm) across; necklace is18-3/4 to 19-1/4 inches long.

name: Knotty Silk Bracelet
description:
When I made the silk ribbon bracelets, I ended up with a pile of these gorgeous knots and just couldn't bring myself to throw them away.

Silk is a marvelous material; the knots are so hard, I had to DRILL them like stones in order to put the wire through!  So this bracelet, made of scraps, ended up taking more time and materials than the pieces the scraps came from.  Go figure!

The result is worth it.  A high-impact bracelet that's nearly weightless.  Abundant color.

Sterling silver wire and toggle closure.  Length 8 inches.

name: Petite Koi Pendant
description:
My handmade glass koi bead, 11mm, in light periwinkle with pale yellow flowers hangs with flowers and Swarovski crystals.  Sweet, petite.  Will look charming with a simple sundress or tee.

Hangs 1-1/2 inches.

name: Sterling Seahorse Pendant
description:
I 'drew' this seahorse in heavy, 16-gauge sterling silver wire, then hammered the wire for a calligraphic effect.  

Pendant hanging length 2 inches.

name: Koi Garden Earrings
description:
These koi earrings are getting a little extra color and swing from the addition of some pretty vintage flower beads.

My handmade glass koi bead, 11mm, is dark periwinkle with pale pink flowers and bright coral fish.  Sterling silver wire.

Overall length is 1-7/8 inches.

name: Mama Hen and Chicks Bracelet
description:
One of the most common sights here on Kauai is a mother hen with several little chicks chasing after her.  

They inspired me to create this bracelet, each link fabricated by hand of 16-gauge sterling silver wire.  

Toggle clasp is a clutch of eggs which fit into a nest.

7-1/2 inches long.
Size may be adjusted; contact me.

name: Charmed Life Bracelet
description:
I like to think of Anne Choi's sugar skulls as reminders to celebrate life. This one, a button, is paired with a found-object piece made by artist Susan Lenart Kazmer that features a playing die, a symbol of fortune, fate, and luck.  

Both show a lot of texture and patina, and that's where I took my inspiration.
I used my own work in fine silver metal clay, that's the carved bead next to the die component; and in glass: the three Jujube beads stacked up next to the skull in mellow sea-green, turquoise and garnet red.  These beads have large bulbs of clear glass laid on top of the colors, for an ever-changing light show.

There are two raku hearts, and some real antiques: a pair of shoe buttons and a Native American silver concho-style button.  Finally, there's a knot of sari silk captured between a pair of Bali silver bead caps.

Sterling silver toggle closure; bracelet measures 8-1/4 inches long.

name: Bunny Pop Bracelet
description:
Bold, citrusy tangerine and glossy green are a fresh combination, straight out of the grove.

Honee Gold Orange Soda pop cap bead with gold accents reminded me of a big ripe orange, so I put a leaf-shaped dark green bead next to it, with some fiery orange flower beads.

I used three of my handmade glass beads in this piece: a koi lentil, with the coral-orange fish swimming on a deep green base with white flowers, a little clear roundel with a wisp of transparent green, and a bright white bunny.

There are also a beautifully made openwork sterling silver bead from Israel, and one of my own fine silver metal clay pods, this time stuffed with hot orange sari silk.

The bunny and koi bead are based upon the same 11mm lentil mold.  Italian glass.  
Sterling silver wire and clasp.
Bracelet measures 7-1/2 inches long.

name: Ladybug Bracelet
description:
In reds from bright to deep, lampwork ladybugs on the march!

Cheery little beads, eight of them, wired on sterling silver to make a bracelet.  Adjustable from 7 to 8 inches long.  There's a silver ladybug charm at the end of the sizing chain, too.

Handmade beads of Italian glass measure 11mm across. Details include bright green eyes and feet on the underside.

Individual beads are available, $12 each.  Contact me to order.

name: Eggplant Bead Ring
description:
As soon as I got this tiny bead from Anne Choi, I knew it would make a perfect ring.

 Charming eggplant motif with 'For Luck' on the sides.  Eggplants are a lucky symbol in Japan, perhaps, according to Wikipedia, because the word for eggplant (nasu or nasubi 茄子) suggests achieving something great (nasu 成す).

I fabricated the shank and pin from sterling silver.  The U-shape is nice because you can turn it sideways to fit over your knuckle. The bead turns freely on the pin, making the ring very comfortable to wear. 

Sized on my ring mandrel at 7.25; The bead is exactly 5/8" long.

name: Sweet Bluebird Earrings
description:
Handmade lampwork bluebirds, a happy pair.

Periwinkle blue, with petal pink breasts and a soft coral heart.

Why settle for one bluebird of happiness when you can have two?

Beads 11mm tall, 20mm beak to tail.  Earrings hang 1-3/8 inches.  

Designed to move, so I include and recommend wearing them with silicone bumpers to hold them in your ears.

name: Orchid Branch Pendant
description:
This pendant is an original sculpture I made in fine silver metal clay.  It is NOT cast from a mold of any kind.  

Handmade flower and branch, joined by embedded fine silver wire.  The piece was thoroughly fired at 1650F, resulting in a solid piece of pure silver.  

Wire-wrapped with 18-gauge fine silver to create a secure bail.  Hangs beautifully.

This is one of four of these sculpted orchid pendants, each unique.

Hanging length 1-1/2 inches; flower measures 3/4 inch across.

name: Pearl and Lucky Carp Earrings
description:
The silver beads on these earrings are unbelieveably tiny and detailed tiny carp by artist Carl Clasmeyer.  

I framed them with 14kt gold-filled beads.  Clear blue apatite and white pearls are the perfect accompaniment.

Sterling silver wire; earrings hang 1-3/8 inches.

name: Daisy Sterling Silver Ring
description:
Cast in sterling silver from an original sculpture I made in precious metal clay, this ring is weighty and feels wonderful.  

A chubby daisy flower on a light band, size about 5 1/2.  For custom sizing, please contact me.

This listing is for one ring only; orchid and camellia rings also available.

If you are interested in the originals, which are fine silver with 24kt gold, please inquire.

name: Famille Rose Vase Pendant
description:
I took my inspiration for this handmade glass bead from Chinese porcelain.  It's shape and decoration call to mind a 19th-century moon vase. 

Italian glass in soft pinks, yellows, celadon green, and sky blue.


I hung it simply, from a vintage mother of pearl button.  All sterling silver wire.

Pendant hangs 2 1-4 inches, bead measures 1-1/8 inches tall.

name: Butterfly in the Clouds Bracelet
description:
In Korea, the butterfly is a symbol of love and happiness.  Anne Choi created this sterling silver bead with a bronze butterfly floating in the clouds, patterned after a Korean textile.

I focused on hearts and ethereal colors to extend the idea.  There's a glowing mother of pearl vintage button in the shape of a flying bird, soft pink and grey keshi pearls suggest the clouds, and a dichroic glass bead by Dee Howl Beads sparkles in silver-blue and pink, with silvery hearts sparkling on the surface.  A handmade lampwork Jujube in sky blue rests with a translucent rose quartz bead. I also made the fine silver wire heart.

The silverplated button is over 100 years old (c. 1860), made into a link with fine turquoise and 14 kt gold-filled beads.

7-1/2 inches long; closes with a lobster-claw clasp in the shape of a heart.  For sizing adjustment, contact me.

name: Dragonfly Rainbow Bracelet
description:
An exquisite, hand-painted porcelain bead by Joan Miller is at the heart of this composition.  A harlequin pattern in a beautiful array: purple, green and melon-range.  The bold, sterling silver dragonfly component by Paula Best sports vintage purple glass and frosted green peridot fringe.  The heart tag is another of Paula's.  The orange curve is vintage plastic. 

My handmade lampwork beads include a velvety purple round and mossy green Jujube, as well as a bright green froggie!  The sparkling lavender/orange dichroic glass bead is from Dee Howl Beads.

Sterling silver wire, finished with a large, funky, fine silver and bronze toggle set.  Bracelet measures 8-3/4 inches; may be sized down a tad by swapping for smaller jump rings between the links; contact me for adjustments.

name: Coral and Smoky Quartz Dangle Earrings
description:
Simple earrings show off contrasting textures:  sparkling, beautifully faceted smoky quartz dangles organic, unpolished branches of red coral.  Tiny 14kt gold-filled beads add a note of warmth.

They coordinate beautifully with this pendant:

http://www.kimvanantwerp.bigcartel.com/product/branch-coral-river-rock-and-pod-pendant

Or this bracelet:
http://www.kimvanantwerp.bigcartel.com/product/chinese-red-koi-and-coral-bracelet

Sterling silver wire, lightweight earrings hang 2 inches.

name: Black Cherry Blackbird Bracelet
description:
Deep red lampwork and garnets take their cues from a bottle cap representing genuine 'Imitation Black Cherry' Soda!

I added my fine silver metal clay pods and a little blackbird charm by artist Paula Best.  There are also a cool hammered silver ring, an old chandelier crystal, and a pewter button finding molded after an original antique.  Labradorite beads show flashes of brilliance; Swarovski black-crystal butterflies add movement.

Closes with a lobster claw clasp and length of sterling silver chain.  Adjusts from 7-1/4 to 8-1/2 inches

name: Beachside Fringe Pendant
description:
Hand fabricated fine silver frames a heavy cluster of gemmy fringe in beach-inspired colors and materials.

Dangles of peachy and red coral blend with lustrous pearls and sea-blue apatite.  Punctuated with heavy fine silver paddles.  

On a heavy sterling silver rolo chain adorned with stations of each color.  Necklace length 19", the pendant hangs an additional two inches.

name: Coeur Cache' Silver Heart Necklace
description:
Handmade charms of silver and bronze metal clay anchor this asymmetrical necklace.

 Am 11mm heart of fine silver is wound with bands to evoke a coeur cache', or captive heart.  Next to it hangs a bronze finial-shaped piece hanging from a matching ring, hammered for an ancient, timeworn texture.  Up the heart side are a strand of beveled garnets and a serpentine station of heavy gauge sterling silver dangling tiny labradorite beads from one arm.  The other side fascinates with a translucent yo-yo of borosilicate glass.  spaced along the heavy sterling silver rolo chain are links made from bronze metal clay.

Necklace length is 23 inches; the charms add another inch.

name: Coeur Cache' silver earrings
description: Simple sterling earwires hold hand-fabricated hearts intricately wrapped with fine wire, illustrating the concept of a cour cache', or captive heart. Fine and sterling silver with liver of sulfur patina, hand-polished. Dangles 1 3/8 inches. Heart measures 5/8 inch across. Makes a lovely set with the Captive Heart Pendant.

name: Sterling Silver Fuschia Blossom Pendant
description:
Years ago, I hand-sculpted several flower designs in Precious Metal Clay.  They turned out great, and I still have them.  This particular flower is part of a pair, intended for earrings.  The originals have 24kt gold wire as the stamens.  Beautiful, but wow! Expensive.

So I had molds made, and these were cast in sterling silver by my dear friend Dan, in Southern California.  I have attached a large jump ring, and am offering them individually as pendants.  If you are adventurous, and have sturdy lobes, contact me about earrings.

Flower pendant hangs 1 1/2 inches, measures 7/8 inch across the petals.  All sterling silver.

Why fool with cut flowers for a Mother's Day gift, when this will last forever?

name: 'I Like Bones' Comic Dog Pendant
description:
'Bow Wow', says this dog, 'I Like Bones'!

Although he's speaking English, he's part of a series of dogs and cats with international vocabularies; this boldly striped and spotted pendant will bring lots of smiles.

I made these pieces for a fund-raiser benefitting the Kauai Humane Society; I'll continue to honor that intention by making a donation of $10 for each piece that sells.

Sterling silver tags are hand-stamped, the letters filled in with color rather than black patina solution. I made the glass head and body of colorful Italian glass.

Pendant measures 2 inches from the top of the jump ring

name: Eye Heart Ewe Necklace
description:
A bit of fun:  the ever-popular rebus for I Love You, in a necklace!

I made these lampwork beads and joined them into links that sit at the front of a sterling silver chain. 

 Necklace length 18 1/2 inches.

name: Picotee Pink Flower Pendant
description:
A delicate glass flower in transparent pink, with darker, cranberry-glass edges.  In the gardening catalogs I used to get, the effect was called 'picotee'.

Delicate is the operative word here.  This piece consists of two flowers on small center bead, as seen in the profile photo.  The flower appears to be floating.  It's beautiful, and I recommend a shorter chain to avoid having it knock into anything.  

Hangs lightly on a stem of sterling silver wire, flower measures 7/8 inch across, hanging length 1 3/8 inches.

Italian glass, kiln-annealed.

name: Strawberry Quartz and Chalcedony Earrings
description:
The colors do the talking in these earrings.  Faceted strawberry-pink quartz beads atop dangling briolettes of aqua chalcedony.  Soft shades to flatter any complexion!

Sterling silver wire; hanging length 1 5/8 inches.

name: Paint it Black Bracelet
description:
I can't take my eyes off that amazing dichroic branch from Olive Glass!

That piece starts out as a gather of molten glass, then it's blown and stretched out into a cane.  Somehow they create these curved pieces without losing the hole, and it must be reaheated and pricked to get those little branchy bumps.  It's glass work at a very high level.  

The iridescent button had a broken shank, so I fabricated a setting for it from sterling silver wire, and I love it.  Some stripey vintage beads paired nicely with old French metal sequins, and the black semicircle on the pop cap draws it into the composition.  Finally, there's my Bean in Orbit, a funky fused fine-silver wire piece I made, on which I hung three Swarovski crystal butterflies, to bring in a little light.

Dark liver of sulfur patina, hand polished.

Sterling silver toggle closure, measures 8" long, not counting the curve. Fits an average wrist.  For custom sizing, please contact me.

name: Pearl and Pod Earrings
description:
Glowing white pearls pair beautifully with the shine of .999 pure silver.

I polished these metal clay pods, but didn't patina them, so they will keep that clean color.  Fine silver will stay white and lovely.  Peeking out underneath is a briolette of sea blue chalcedony, a natural choice with a pearl!  The links are joined by a tiny ring of bronze.

Hanging length 1 5/8 inches.

Did you ever wonder why you so often see briolette beads wire-wrapped this way?  It's because the tip is extremely fine and delicate, often pointy.  Creating an improvised bead cap with the wire overwrap not only looks nice, but protects the bead and the wearer.

name: Lucky Peony Bracelet
description:
The peony is an elegant flower, and an auspicious one, according to the principles of feng shui.

Anne Choi's sterling silver peony bead, with 'For Luck' on the sides, inspired this composition.  Links include bronze and pure silver metal clay findings made by me, an antique chandelier crystal, a lampwork Jujube, pearl, smoky quartz, pressed glass, bugle beads, and a knot of celadon green silk. 

Closes with a sterling silver lobster claw clasp in the shape of a heart, from Italy.  Adjusts from 7 to 8 inches long.

name: Bright Birds Earrings
description:
Fun, swingy little birds for your lobes.

Bodies of avocado green, with sky blue dots and coral wings.
They are 15mm from nose to tail, and just 8mm tall.  Hanging from sterling silver wires.  Overall earring length is 1 1/4 inches.

 Designed to bobble flirtatiously, I've included silicone bumpers to make sure they don't fly away

name: Beckoning Cat Bracelet
description:
The beckoning cat is a popular good-luck symbol in Japan, and its growing popularity is an indicator of its effectiveness!

Anne Choi's charming sterling silver bead features the fortuitous feline, and says, 'Good Luck' on the sides. 

For the bracelet I've chosen cheery colors that remind me of Japanese textiles that I see often here in Hawaii. Stones include coral, turquoise, rose quartz, peridot, crystal clear quartz, apatite, and a pearl.  The big red bar is vintage bakelite. A shot of pinky purple comes from my own lampwork Jujube.

I added a hand-fabricated heart of fine silver, from which dangles a tiny mouse!  See, the cat comes with built-in luck.

Eight inches long, with an Italian sterling silver clasp in the shape of a heart.

Hey, if you order this bracelet, you are automatically lucky, because you get to wear it!

name: Big Bunny
description:
My lampwork tends to be tiny.  So for me, this one-inch-wide bunny is really big!

White bunny hanging from vintage bakelite flower buttons in yellow and red, layered and wired with sterling silver.

Overall length 1 5/8 inches.

name: Amor Fati
description:
'Love of Fate'

The skull in this context speaks of celebrating life!

This pendant features a sugar skull button in sterling silver from artist Anne Choi. From it hangs a bow tied of dark, silvery-teal sari silk and a matching heart-shaped lampwork bead I made.  Below that are three hollow pod forms of pure silver.

Pendant measures 4 inches long. 

It looks great on this 20" patterned sterling silver chain, available separately (contact me).

name: Berry Garnet and Silver Seedpod Earrings
description:
Stunning, sterling silver seedpod charms dangle from a gold-filled ring under a string of juicy, berry-red garnets in a unique, beveled-square shape.

Tiny gold-filled beads enhance the sterling silver earwires.  Total hanging length is 2 inches.

If you look closely, you can see that the opening in center of the pod is a butterfly's silhouette!

name: Chain of Hearts
description:
This is the biggest soldering project I've taken on so far; I have a book of chain ideas to learn with, but naturally I can't just look at that and follow directions.  I can't figure out if that's a weakness or a strength, but it resulted in this cool bracelet!

Entirely hand-fabricated out of sterling silver wire, toggle closure.  Liver of sulfur patina, hand-polished and tumbled.

7 1/2 inches long.

name: Jonquil Bangle
description:
These colors speak to me of spring bulbs:  crocus, jonquil, tulip.

One Jujube in light but rich butter yellow paired with a furnace glass bead from Mingo and Asho with stripes of yellow, lavender, softest green, and a bit of sparkling goldstone.

Lampwork bead measures 4 x 14mm; furnace bead 4 x 12mm, on 12-gauge sterling silver wire.

Custom-sized bangles can be ordered.

name: Sparkly Teal and Coral Bangle
description:
Both of these furnace glass beads have clear cores and layers of sparkling goldstone, giving them a soft, almost ethereal appearance.  Beads by Mingo and Asho in shades of coral/rusty pink and teal/aqua.  

Beads measure 9 x 10 and 4 x 9mm on 12-gauge sterling silver wire.

Fits an average wrist; contact me for custom sizes.

name: Blue River Koi Bracelet
description:
Eight of my tiny (10mm) koi fish beads strung with sterling silver and Swarovski crystals in a pretty denim blue.  This bracelet just goes with everything.

Pale pink flowers, bright coral koi on a base that looks like the bottom of a riverbed.

Italian sterling silver lobster claw clasp; adjusts from 7-8 inches via a sterling chain.

name: One Cute Chick
description:
'Cute' is clearly not something I'm afraid of.

This little birdie, in the palest pink, makes a charming pendant.  A Swarovski crystal butterfly hanging from the bail adds sparkle, and sterling silver feet dangle as it moves; it can also stand up on a flat surface.

Lampwork glass by me; silver feet by Penny Michelle.

Hanging length is 1 3/4".

name: Sun + Sky Bangle
description:
Two blues and a big sunny yellow, all Jujubes of my making.  These beads start with a small core of color, then I add large dots of clear glass to magnify and direct the light down into them for an eyepopping optical effect.

Beads 13- 20- and 15 mm diameter, on 12-gauge sterling silver wire.

name: Orchid Bead Pendant
description:
This orchid bead is such a beautiful combination of colors.  The turquoise blue of the base is as bright at the Hawaiian sky, adorned with two flamboyant orchid flowers in the softest shades of pink and yellow.  Simple leaves in a calm green anchor the composition perfectly.  

I combined it with Swarovski rondelles and a vintage pink flower bead to create a pendant you can wear with all your favorite outfits.  It's simple, but never ordinary! Sterling silver wire.

Bead measures 22 x 23mm (h x w) across the widest points.
Overall length is 47mm, about 1 7/8 inches.

name: Pink and Teal Bangle
description:
This bangle has one of my juicy Jujube beads in gorgeous Gold Pink, so-called because gold is used to create that color in the glass, paired with a pink, aqua and teal-striped furnace glass bead from Mingo and Asho.

Lampwork bead is 5 x 15 mm; furnace bead is 5 x 13 mm, on 12-gauge sterling silver wire.

name: Rainbow Bangle Bracelet
description:
This sterling silver bangle bracelet features a very fine focal bead from Mingo and Asho.  

The colors are hand-mixed and pulled into canes, then added to a large gather of glass, which in turn is blown to create the hole, then pulled into a long cane.  The beads are cut off this long piece and fire-polished till they slump a little, giving the soft-edged shape you see here.  It's a unique extra step that makes these beads extra special.

14 x 13 mm bead on 12-gauge sterling silver wire.

Custom sizes available!

name: Heart Swings pendant
description:
I hung this stunning bronze heart by artist Judie Mountain trapeze-style from my own lampwork bead, which features swirling, oxblood-red ribbons of glass encased in clear.  The composition is topped off with a vintage, mother-of-pearl button for a whimsical effect.

Sterling silver wire, chain, and findings. Hangs 4 inches from the top of the jump ring.

name: Sun is Shining Long Pendant
description:
If your disposition needs some buffing, this bright pendant will make it downright sunny.

I've joined some wonderful sun-inspired components with sterling silver wire to create this substantial pendant that has great movement and color.

From the top:

Mixed-metal silver and brass bead from Bali
Lentil-shaped sun bead by Joan Miller Porcelain
SunCrest orange soda pop bottle cap bead 
Sterling silver sun with fused dichroic glass center by Nancy Goodenough

Carefully wrapped in tissue and packed in a blue recycled kraft paper jewelry box.  Shipped in a padded envelope.  If you prefer shipping in a priority mail box, just let me know and I'll adjust the shipping cost to $5.

name: 'Bau Bau' Comic Dog Pendant
description:
'Bau Bau', says this dog, in Italian! 

--edited, I thought it was Japanese but went back to check.  

He's part of a series of dogs and cats with international vocabularies, this boldly striped and spotted pendant will bring lots of smiles.  

I made these pieces for a fund-raiser benefitting the Kauai Humane Society; I'll continue to honor that intention by making a donation of $10 for each piece that sells.

Sterling silver tags are hand-stamped with 'Bau Bau' and 'Rub My Belly'; the letters filled in with color rather than black patina solution.  I made the glass head and body of colorful Italian glass.

Pendant measures 2 1/4 inches from the top of the jump ring.

name: 'Miaou' Comic Cat Pendant
description:
Oh, is that Fanchette calling?

This kitty meows in French!  Part of a series of dogs and cats with international vocabularies, this boldly striped and spotted pendant will bring lots of smiles.  

I made these pieces for a fund-raiser benefitting the Kauai Humane Society; I'll continue to honor that intention by making a donation of $10 for each piece that sells.

Sterling silver tags are hand-stamped with 'miaou' and 'purr', the letters filled in with color rather than black patina solution.  I made the glass head and body of colorful Italian glass.

Pendant measures 2 1/4 inches from the top of the jump ring.

name: Silk Cocoon Flower Pin
description:
These silk cocoons are an inspired pairing with my fine silver metal clay pods!

I colored the silk with fiber reactive dye and sharpie markers, then cut the cocoons into flower shapes, which I layered with the hollow metal pieces.  I wired them onto a large pod 'branch', using 18-gauge sterling silver wire, which also forms the pin.  The wire blends in perfectly, giving the impression of a vine twining 'round the branch.

The branch pod is 1 5/8 inches long; overall, the piece measures 1 7/8 inches from the top of the purple flower across to the edge of the small green one.  It's a very wearable size, but big enough to get noticed!

name: Rose Quartz and Bronze Bracelet
description:
I love the contrast in this piece.  

A very heavy, handmade sterling silver chain from Bali and heavy accents made by me of bronze metal clay set off the soft translucence of Rose Quartz and iridescent Labradorite.  A sparkling Smoky Quartz bead brings light into the composition.  The effect is of weight tempered by light.  

The pure silver pod form embodies the idea; it is visually substantial, relatively large.  Yet it's hollow and lightweight, and has a slightly iridescent patina, giving it an ethereal quality.

It's a beautiful combination of heft and delicacy.

Closes with a sterling silver lobster claw clasp in the shape of a heart, from Italy.  Fits an average wrist and can be sized upon request.

name: Glass Hibiscus Earrings
description:
The glass in these earrings is a soft shade of transparent pale amber that frames your face with a luminous glow.

Each earring is a double-sided flower, measuring approximately one inch in diameter across the petals.  They are hung lightly from sterling silver wire and designed to dangle and play in the light.  For that reason, I suggest wearing them with the included silicone 'bumpers' to keep them securely in your ears.  

Not heavy, but substantial.  I am not a big earring wearer (just got my ears pierced in December), and I wore these all day with no discomfort.

Italian glass, kiln-annealed.

name: Hibiscus Charm Pendant: Kauai is for Lovers
description:
Here in Hawaii, we see hibiscus flowers in every conceivable color. 

I gave this glass bead a swirling green background with bright white flowers adorning the surface.

I put the bead on a handmade ball-tip headpin of heavy-gauge (14g) fine silver, then added charms:  a puffy, sterling silver heart; a silver wire heart made by me; and a vintage flower and leaf combined with a clear Swarovski crystal.

These were a hit at the International Flower Show in Philadelphia, and this is the last one, so don't miss it!

Fresh, bright colors speak of springtime all year round.

The bead measures 28 x 10mm. Overall length is 48mm, about 1 7/8 inches.

name: Dragonfly's Pond Bracelet
description:
One of my small lentil beads featuring a dragonfly motif was the starting point for this bracelet.  I added a sterling silver charm from Paula Best, some vintage pressed-glass leaves and a raku heart.  I wrought a ring from heavy sterling wire and hung some tiny water sapphires from it.  And there are some of my organic shapes in both bronze and fine silver metal clay.  The muted colors evoke a shady pond under moss-hung cypress trees.

Closes with a sterling silver heart-shaped lobster claw clasp from Italy.  Fits an average-to-small wrist, and can be sized up easily.

name: Autumn Leaves Bracelet
description:
This bracelet features a handmade sterling silver acorn button by artist Anne Choi!

The acorn naturally suggested a fall theme, so I created components with colors and textures that remind me of autumn leaves.  Rich red-orange, green, and purple dominate the composition.

Along with Anne's button, there are lampwork glass beads made by me, one of my fine silver metal clay pods, and a coppery raku heart.  I used copper, fine silver and sterling silver to create unique components with pressed-glass flowers and Indian sari silk.

This bracelet is sized to fit an average to small wrist; links can easily be added to fit anyone.

name: The Hedgehog's Garden Bracelet
description:
I went all out with the flower garden theme on this bracelet!

Starting with one of my lampwork hedgehog beads (11mm), I dug into my stash of vintage flower beads to create unique and colorful links.  There's one of my special jujube beads, and even a stunning sterling silver starflower from Russell Strawn Smith of Scattered Light Jewelry.  Completing the composition are a tiny shovel and garden fork, a ladybug charm, and a round silver bead with Gilson opal inlay.

With a garden like this, who needs the hassle of the real thing?

Bracelet measures 8-8 3/8".  I can add links to lengthen it if necessary.
